column4: I am trying to make my linux desktop into a wireless to ethernet network bridge for both my laptops, can anyone help me with this please?
well how do i look up these routing tables? :|
rather than constantly being directed to google after google, cant someone actually give some person to person support instead?
is this for internet connection sharing, an ad-hoc network or other
i simply want my desktop to show up on my laptop's wireless, and then be able to connect through it
both my desktop and laptop have wireless units, and the desktop is connected via ethernet to the outside world
it is called bridging or tunneling..
what do you mean do i have a link?
do you have a clear picture of how you want to do this?
in my head yes... LAPTOP *wireless* DESKTOP *wire* Internet
i want to connect through my desktop
